 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# EAK2000 Φάσματα"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from streng.codes.greek.eak2000.raw.ch2.seismic_action import spectra\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import matplotlib\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "ground_type = 'Β'"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "T1=0.15\n",
      "T2=0.6\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "T1 = spectra.T1(ground_type)\n",
    "T2 = spectra.T2(ground_type)\n",
    "print(f'T1={T1}')\n",
    "print(f'T2={T2}')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x288 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "x = np.linspace(1e-10, 2, 201)\n",
    "y = spectra.Φd(T=x,\n",
    "               α=0.16,\n",
    "               γI=1.0,\n",
    "               T1=T1,\n",
    "               T2=T2,\n",
    "               q=3.5,\n",
    "               η=1.0,\n",
    "               θ=1.0,\n",
    "               β0=2.5)\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.plot(x, y, lw=2, label='EAK spectrum')\n",
    "plt.axis([0, 2, 0, 1.2 * y.max()])\n",
    "plt.ylabel('$S_{e}$ (g)') \n",
    "plt.xlabel('$T$ (sec)') #'μθpl'  \n",
    "plt.title('EEAK spectrum')\n",
    "plt.legend()\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "0.03\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "print(f'{x[3]:.2f}')"
   ]
